column5: Hey everyone,  I was doing a search on the web about night fishing for Steelhead and came upon this site http://www.eveningsecretfishing.com/  They start out by saying.....and I quote....hehe  "How The Shocking Discovery Of A Long-Lost Evening Secret Fishing Weapon From 1947 Will Send Swarms Of Blood-Thirsty Game Fish To Your Spot So You Can Double Your Catches, Guaranteed!"  "So Powerful It Was Banned In 2 States! 100% Guaranteed To Double Your Catches!"  They are selling it for a bargain $200 USD...LOL.  I've visited some other boards who have discussed this and there isn't a clear answer on what this thing does.  Some say it's an underwater light that you can get at BPS for $20.  The website says it attracts plankton, which attracts bait fish, which attract big fish.  Anyone heard of this product?  Or use it?  Or know someone who uses it?  I'd never buy it...I personally think it's a big gimmick....
Hmmm, too good to be true, you know what they say. Then if it's a light, you might want to read the rules about fishing with light(s) and particular species.
It may work and to the best of my knowledge the product or similar products available at BPS in the states are illegal to use in Ontario/Canada.
